question:
Which among the following pairs of lakes and their features is/are correctly matched?
  1. Lake Tanganyika - Longest freshwater lake in the world
  2. Lake Michigan - Deepest lake in the world
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
Lake Tanganyika is the longest freshwater lake in the world. It is second largest by volume. It is bordered by the following countries: Burundi, Tanzania, Zambia, Democratic Republic of the Congo.

Lake Michigan is part of the Great Lakes. It is located in Unites States. Michigan lake is the largest lake located entirely in one country.

Lake Baikal in Russia is the deepest lake in the world. It is the largest volume freshwater lake in the world.
